pitch.cc: Armando Galarraga is really trying to keep Jarrod Dyson close; he is 3-for-4 in stolen base attempts this season.
That was pitch number 45 for Armando Galarraga; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .217 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .283 off him after that.
